subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: James Nitties, a PGA Tour rookie, finished with four consecutive birdies for a five-under 65 and a share of the first-round lead with Ken Duke in the HP Byron Nelson Championship in Irving, Tex.
snippet: James Nitties, a PGA Tour rookie, finished with four consecutive birdies for a five-under 65 and a share of the first-round lead with Ken Duke in the HP Byron Nelson Championship in Irving, Tex.
